title: Massing in the East (3U92)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Exert a [Sauron] minion to discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player's draw deck for each of these races you can spot in the fellowship: Dwarf, Elf, Man, and Wizard.
Lore:	”'The power of the Black Land grows….'”
Rarity:	U
